## Summary

## How to test
- [ ] `./build.sh` runs successfully
- [ ] `./run.sh` launches and UI opens
- [ ] Verified with **Monitor** tab (if relevant)
- [ ] Verified Accessibility behavior (System Settings → Privacy & Security → Accessibility)

## Notes for reviewers
- This project intentionally keeps most logic in one file for auditability: `Sources/BC64Keys/BC64KeysApp.swift`
- If you changed key code / modifier behavior, describe the exact keys tested and the expected output.
